General Overview

Battery Chemistry
Lithium Iron Phosphate (LiFePO₄)
Nominal Voltage
76.8V
Nominal Capacity
102Ah
Energy Capacity
7.84 kWh
Cell Configuration
24S1P (24 cells in series)
Operating Voltage Range
64V - 87.6V

Key Features

This professional-grade LiFePO₄ battery pack delivers exceptional performance with advanced safety features, making it ideal for demanding applications requiring reliable, long-lasting power storage.

Electrical Characteristics

Cell Type
GT 102Ah LFP Prismatic Cells
Cycle Life
≥3,500 cycles @ 80% DoD
Calendar Life
8 years (typical)
Max Discharge Current
1.5C Continuous / 3.5C Peak (30s)
Max Charge Current
1C Continuous
Internal Resistance
≤50 mΩ @ 1kHz (fully charged)

Performance Specifications

High energy density with 7.84 kWh capacity
Superior cycle life exceeding 3,500 cycles
Low internal resistance for efficient operation
Wide operating voltage range (60V-80V)
High discharge rates up to 3.5C peak
Fast charging capability at 1C continuous

Mechanical Specifications

Dimensions (L×W×H)
813mm × 300mm × 205mm
Weight
Approximately 55 kg
Enclosure Material
304 Stainless Steel (Laser Welded)
IP Rating
IP65 (Watertight)
Main Connector
Futronic FHV20×26×T (250A Peak)
Data Connector
WS16 (7-pin)

Construction Features

Built with premium 304 stainless steel construction and laser welding for maximum durability. The IP65-rated enclosure ensures protection against dust and water ingress, making it suitable for harsh environments.

Environmental Specifications

Charge Temperature Range
0°C to +55°C
Discharge Temperature Range
-20°C to +60°C
Storage Temperature
-10°C to +45°C (recommended)
Humidity
<95% RH (non-condensing)
Altitude
≤2,000m
Vibration Resistance
Included mounting brackets

Advanced Battery Management System

Evoke v6.7 BMS

State-of-the-art battery management system with comprehensive protection and optimization features.

Protection Features

Pack over/under voltage protection
Individual string voltage monitoring
Short circuit protection
Excessive power consumption protection
Over/under temperature limitations
Low power cutoff

Smart Features

Power optimization algorithms
Variable voltage balancing
Passive cell balancing
Temperature-based power ramping
Limp mode for emergency operation
Constant current/voltage charging
Cell delta threshold protection
Charger safety control

Applications

Electric Motorcycles & Tricycles

Industrial Equipment

Versatile Power Solution

Designed for a wide range of applications requiring reliable, high-capacity energy storage with excellent safety characteristics and long service life.

Safety & Certifications

Certifications

UN 38.3 Transportation Safety
IEC 62133 / UL 2580 / UL 1973 (on request)
CE & RoHS Compliant
EMC Compliance: EN 61000

Important Safety Guidelines

  • Do not short-circuit, crush, or puncture the battery
  • Do not expose to fire or temperatures above 60°C
  • Only use compatible chargers
  • Store in a dry, cool, and well-ventilated area
  • Follow manufacturer's MSDS and safety instructions
